name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Elixir Engineer with 13+ years of experience in backend development, specializing in **Elixir**, **Rust**, and **microservices** architecture. Proven ability to design and implement **event-driven architectures** and apply **domain-driven design** principles to create scalable solutions. Experienced in TDD, employing testing methodologies to ensure robust application functionality.
Skilled in Agile methodologies, enhancing team collaboration and delivering quality software rapidly. Strong problem-solving capabilities, with a focus on communication and collaboration among cross-functional teams. Previous experience includes delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Highly proficient in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure** while adhering to standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
